items.title: Logitech’s regularly $120 MX Vertical ergonomic wireless mouse is down to $70 today (42% off)
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Logitech’s MX Vertical mouse down to $69.99 shipped. Originally $100, this wireless ergonomic mouse has more recently been going for $120. It’s now seeing a 42% discount that takes $50 off its usual going rate to mark one on the lowest prices we’ve tracked for it to date. It has dipped a touch lower in the past, but this marks the biggest price cut we’ve tracked in over a year, and it also happens to be the lowest price we’ve seen since the jump to $120. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Save an exclusive $1,500 on the 3,072Wh Gendome Home3000 power station with 50-minute fast charging at a new $799 low
items.summary:
We’ve secured quite a high-power exclusive deal for you from Wellbots, which gives you the Gendome Home3000 Portable Power Station for $799 shipped, after using our exclusive code 9TO5H3000 at checkout. It’s starting the deal off coming down from its full $2,299 rate (which starts higher at $2,599 at other sites like Amazon) to $1,598 – but with our exclusive code, you’re getting an additional $799 cut from the tag for a total of $1,500 savings! That’s a 65% markdown off the tag that beats out all the previous discounts we’ve tracked on it before, which only took costs down as low as $899 for early Black Friday sales – marking a new all-time low price on a seriously-capable option over pricier brands. items.summary:
Alongside the debut of the brand WH-1000XM6 earbuds today, Sony is also expanding its XM6 over-ear headphones lineup as well. Last year’s XM6 headphones launch was a big one for the brand and easily among the most popular releases in the category among readers around here…but there was one thing missing for some folks, and that (not so) smoky pink colorway is finally now available for purchase (or will be momentarily).

items.title: Review: Sony just launched its next-gen WH-1000XM6 wireless earbuds
items.summary:
Sony is officially launching its next-generation WH-1000XM6 wireless earbuds today. Much like its latest XM6 over-ears, Sony has made improvements across the board here with a next-gen noise canceling processor, its best call quality in a set of earbuds, improved Bluetooth connectivity “in any environment,” access to Google Gemini (and Siri), and an updated bud and case design. They are available for purchase starting now (or will be momentarily).

items.title: EcoFlow’s 1,024Wh DELTA 3 Classic + 2,048Wh DELTA 3 Max 400W solar bundle at $399 and $1,199 for today only, more
items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Valentine’s Day Sale, EcoFlow has launched the next of its 24-hour flash sales, and we’re seeing two power station options among the four offerings – all of which are seeing up to 62% discounts. Things start lowest with EcoFlow’s DELTA 3 Classic Portable Power Station at $399 shipped, matching its Amazon pricing. You’ll find it listed for a $599 MSRP direct from the brand’s site, but can more often find it down between $448 and $429, with dips lower to $399, $377, and a one-time $349 low that lasted a few hours on November 10. For the rest of the day you’re getting a $49 markdown off the going rate (and $200 off the MSRP) for the third-lowest price we have tracked. Of course, for a larger battery and solar-charging capabilities, there’s also the DELTA 3 Max Portable Power Station with a 400W solar panel at $1,199 shipped, also matching its Amazon pricing. Head below to also check out the add-on accessory offers, too.
